Title: No-Bake Chocolate Chip Cookies
Subtitle: A Sweet History
Content: Try this variation of an old favorite recipe. These cookies are very easy to make and taste good too. This recipe takes only 10 minutes to prepare.

:ibox:• 1½ cups oatmeal
• ½ cup chocolate chips
• ¼ cup butter
• ¼ cup milk
• 1 teaspoon vanilla
• 1 cup sugar

:ibox:1. Wash your hands.
2. Add oatmeal and chocolate chips to a mixing bowl. Stir together.
3. Add butter, milk, vanilla, and sugar to a microwave-safe bowl. Heat in the microwave until butter is melted (about 1 minute).
4. Add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients. Mix well.
5. Drop spoonfuls of the mixture onto a cookie sheet. Allow them to become firm.
6. Once the cookies are ready, eat and enjoy!
Tip: Put the cookies in the freezer to harden them faster. Keep them fresh longer by storing them in the freezer too.
